QuestData.Title: Wisdom Has A Price
QuestData.Description: <Ana listens to your story, and nods.>$b$bCrocolisks attacking? I know a story about that. And I will share it with you, but first... I grow hungry.$b$bShark meat should do the trick. You should find enough sharks in the water beneath us.
QuestData.CompletionText: My hunger is great, $r. I have been on this lagoon for several days, without food.
QuestData.RewardText: You've brought me more meat than I could ever hope to eat.$b$bNow, I suppose I owe you a story...
